sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Update the label for the table sys_notification_execution from Notification Execution to Notification Log</description>
        <name>Update notification execution label</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[(function() {
	if (pm.isZboot())
		return;

	var dbObject = new GlideRecord('sys_db_object');
	dbObject.addQuery('name', 'sys_notification_execution');
	dbObject.query();
	if (!dbObject.next())
		return;
	
	dbObject.setValue('label', 'Notification Log');
	dbObject.setWorkflow(false);
	dbObject.update();
	
	var doc = new GlideRecord('sys_documentation');
	doc.addQuery('name', 'sys_notification_execution');
	doc.addNullQuery('element');
	doc.addQuery('label', 'Notification Execution');
	doc.query();
	if (!doc.next())
		return;
	
	doc.setValue('label', 'Notification Log');
	doc.setValue('plural', 'Notification Logs');
	doc.setWorkflow(false);
	doc.update();

})();]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2021-09-28 19:19:19</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>c1fc76f25332301092f0ddeeff7b1254</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Update notification execution label</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Notification Providers" source="com.glide.notification.provider">e5887ca03cf1311068bcf327dfe37f57</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_c1fc76f25332301092f0ddeeff7b1254</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2021-09-28 19:45:15</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
